name: Again Car Drift Race
description:
Get ready for the most challenging tracks!

Featured as #1 New Game for Racing and Simulation in US, UK, Taiwan and many more!

Simple control:
tap left/right of screen to turn
Double tap left/right of screen to drift

Over 30 tracks with easy/hard mode!

Each tracks can be finished in a very short time, but only the master of drifting can finish the tracks!

If you cannot complete the track, try again!
